txt.en:
'You have helped me once, Sivullinen; perhaps you can help me with something else?

'We here in Pynti-peldot are the main source of tusks from the great kalpa-kita that roam the area, which are made into intricate carvings for which the area is well-known, then sent south to Kauppa-kohta to be traded or sold.

'We are running low on our supply of tusks, and I would have you bring me more. Kalpa-kita are found especially in a little wooded dell at Leijona-kotin, west along the road and then south, beyond the homestead of Lumi-talletta.'
'Ah! I will be able to make wonderful carvings with these... thank you, Sivullinen!'

'Have you enough tusks to provide some winter occupation for myself and my friends? No? Why not?\n\n'Kalpa-kita roam all over Itä-ma, but are found especially in a wooded dell called Leijona-kotin, west along the road and then south, beyond the homestead of Lumi-talletta.'
Pynti-peldot is the primary source of cat-tusk scrimshaw in Forochel. The Lossoth carve the large tusks during the long winter nights, and sell them to south-landers.
Kalpa-kita can be found in and around their den at Leijona-kotin, as well as roaming the rest of Itä-ma.\n\nKimmo has asked you to bring him some tusks from the kalpa-kita which roam Forochel.
Return to Kimmo with the kalpa-kita tusks
Kimmo is at Pynti-peldot. You should return to him with the kalpa-kita tusks.
